title: Dow Jones Futures Rise; Apple, Google, Amazon, Meta, Nvidia In Focus
description: Stock market futures are climbing as investors focus on major tech earnings. Big tech names including Apple, Google, Amazon, Meta and Nvidia are in the spotlight ahead of upcoming quarterly reports.

title: What Does Coinbase's CEO Know That You Don't?â€”$545M Sold, 88 Sells, 0 Buys
description: Coinbase CEO Brian Armstrong has sold $545 million in stock with 88 sell transactions and zero buys, raising questions about insider sentiment toward the crypto exchange.

title: If You Invested $10,000 in Palantir During Its IPO, Here's How Much You'd Have Now
description: Palantir has been one of the best-performing stocks since its 2020 direct listing. A $10,000 investment at IPO would now be worth significantly more as AI demand drives growth.

title: Is Visa (V) Ken Griffin's Top Pick?
description: Citadel CEO Ken Griffin has been accumulating shares of Visa, making it one of his top holdings. The payments giant continues to benefit from the shift to digital payments.

title: Is NVIDIA (NVDA) Clifford Asness' Top Pick?
description: AQR Capital founder Clifford Asness has significant exposure to NVIDIA as the chipmaker continues to dominate the AI infrastructure market with unprecedented demand for GPUs.

title: Is Meta Platforms (META) Philippe Laffont's Top Pick?
description: Coatue Management's Philippe Laffont remains bullish on Meta Platforms despite regulatory concerns. The social media giant's AI investments and cost-cutting are driving efficiency.

title: Is Apple (AAPL) John Overdeck's Top Pick?
description: Two Sigma's John Overdeck has maintained a significant position in Apple as the tech giant prepares for its AI-powered iPhone cycle and services revenue growth continues.

title: Markets Await Fed Minutes and Retail Sales Data
description: Investors are looking ahead to this week's Federal Reserve meeting minutes and retail sales data for clues on the direction of monetary policy and consumer spending strength.

title: Oil Prices Steady as Supply Concerns Balance Demand Worries
description: Crude oil prices are holding steady near recent levels as OPEC production cuts support prices while concerns about global demand growth persist amid economic uncertainty.

title: Tech Stocks Lead Market Gains as AI Boom Continues
description: Technology stocks are outperforming the broader market as artificial intelligence investments continue to drive revenue growth across the sector. Cloud providers and chipmakers are seeing strong demand.
